name: A Bloody Party
description: "Vampires don't exist... right?" When your best friend becomes obsessed with vampires and bravely (foolishly) decides to crash a party to prove his crazy theory, you end up volunteering to go in his place to stop him. After all, a night of free food and dancing? Why not? It's not like vampires actually exist, right?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: i5+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card Storage: 205 MB available space Sound Card: -
